description: Rules enforcing standardized, transparent, and privacy-compliant analytics across VibeX.
philosophy: Tracking must be transparent, standardized, and never hidden. Data exists to inform decisions, not to exploit users.

rules.name: Standardized Event Schema
rules.description: All analytics events must conform to the schema defined in /docs/_Tracking_Standards.md.
guidelines: Each event must include category, action, and metadata.
Do not send raw, unstructured event data.
Schema version must be included in every event payload.

rules.name: Human-Readable Event Names
rules.description: Event names must be descriptive and human-readable.

rules.name: No Hidden or Undocumented Tracking
rules.description: All tracking must be documented and visible in the codebase.
guidelines: No hidden analytics calls inside utility functions.
All tracking logic must be declared explicitly in `analytics/` folder.
Each event must have a doc entry in /docs/_Tracking_Standards.md.

rules.name: Privacy Compliance
rules.description: Tracking must comply with user consent and regional privacy laws (GDPR, CCPA).
guidelines: Never collect PII without explicit consent.
Provide users with opt-out controls for analytics.

steps.name: Define Event
steps.action: Check /docs/_Tracking_Standards.md and define event with schema fields.

steps.name: Implement in Analytics Module
steps.action: Place tracking logic inside `src/analytics/` and call it from components via clear function names.

steps.name: Document Event
steps.action: Add the event definition to /docs/_Tracking_Standards.md with description and payload example.

steps.name: Verify Consent Compliance
steps.action: Ensure event firing respects consent flags (opt-in/out).

verification.doc_check: Every event must be documented in /docs/_Tracking_Standards.md.
verification.runtime_check: Run analytics QA tests to confirm correct payloads and consent handling.
